item.title: Arch Linux Samba Server 2021
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to install Samba Server on Arch Linux. I hope you enjoy! Links smb.conf Link git smb.conf Commands 1. Install Samba $ sudo pacman -S samba wget 2. smb.conf $ sudo wget -O /etc/samba/smb.conf LinkToSmb.ConfAbove Edit /etc/samba/smb.conf and change: Line 26 workgroup = WORKGROUP Create Samba Share In the end off file. [sambashare] comment = My Samba Share path = /samba writable = yes browsable = yes create mask = 0700 directory mask 0700 read only = no guest ok = no 3.
